name: Fajr Prayer
rules: The time of Fajr is from Subh-e-Sadiq until sunrise.
niyat_arabic: أصلي فرض الفجر ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Fajr Fard prayer.

name: Dhuhr Prayer
rakats: 4 Rakats Sunnah + 4 Rakats Fard + 2 Rakats Sunnah + 2 Rakats Nafl
rules: From when the sun passes its zenith until the time of Asr.
niyat_arabic: أصلي فرض الظهر أربع ركعات لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform four rakats of Dhuhr Fard prayer.

name: Asr Prayer
rules: From the end of Dhuhr time until before sunset.
niyat_arabic: أصلي فرض العصر أربع ركعات لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform four rakats of Asr Fard prayer.

name: Maghrib Prayer
rakats: 3 Rakats Fard + 2 Rakats Sunnah + 2 Rakats Nafl
rules: From sunset until the red glow in the western sky disappears.
niyat_arabic: أصلي فرض المغرب ثلاث ركعات لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform three rakats of Maghrib Fard prayer.

name: Isha Prayer
rakats: 4 Rakats Sunnah + 4 Rakats Fard + 2 Rakats Sunnah + 2 Rakats Nafl
rules: From the disappearance of the white glow in the western sky until Subh-e-Sadiq.
niyat_arabic: أصلي فرض العشاء أربع ركعات لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform four rakats of Isha Fard prayer.

name: Witr Prayer
rules: From after Isha until before Fajr; the best time is after Tahajjud.
niyat_arabic: أصلي وتر ثلاث ركعات لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform three rakats of Witr prayer.

name: Tahajjud Prayer
rules: After waking up from sleep until before Fajr.
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة التهجد ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Tahajjud Nafl prayer.

name: Chasht (Duha) Prayer
rules: From 15–20 minutes after sunrise until Dhuhr.
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة الضحى ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Chasht (Duha) Nafl prayer.

name: Istikhara Prayer
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة الاستخارة ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Istikhara Nafl prayer.

name: Istisqa (Prayer for Rain)
rules: It is better to perform in congregation.
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة الاستسقاء ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of prayer for rain.

name: Taraweeh Prayer
rakats: 20 Rakats Sunnah Muakkadah (8 Rakats is also permissible)
rules: After Isha Fard during the month of Ramadan.
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة التراويح ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Taraweeh prayer.

name: Solar Eclipse Prayer
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة الكسوف ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of solar eclipse prayer.

name: Lunar Eclipse Prayer
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة الخسوف ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of lunar eclipse prayer.

name: Qasr (Traveler) Prayer
rakats: If Fard is 4 Rakats, it is shortened to 2 Rakats
rules: During travel of 48+ miles and stay less than 15 days.
niyat_arabic: أصلي فرض الظهر ركعتين للقصر لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Dhuhr Fard prayer in Qasr.

name: Eid-ul-Fitr Prayer
rules: From after sunrise until before Dhuhr.
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة عيد الفطر ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Eid-ul-Fitr prayer.

name: Eid-ul-Adha Prayer
rules: From after sunrise until before Dhuhr.
niyat_arabic: أصلي صلاة عيد الأضحى ركعتين لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform two rakats of Eid-ul-Adha prayer.

name: Janazah Prayer
niyat_arabic: أصلي على هذا الميت لله تعالى
niyat_local: I intend to perform the Janazah prayer for this deceased person.
